sentences.sContent: Your gnash one's teeth says: Upstairs corridor falls!
sentences.sContent_eng: Your gnash one's teeth says: Upstairs corridor falls!
sentences.sCn: 你咬牙说： 楼上过道摔下来的！

sentences.sContent: In a moment the pirate be all around us rolling their eyes gnash their teeth and filing their nail.
sentences.sContent_eng: In a moment the pirate be all around us rolling their eyes gnash their teeth and filing their nail.
sentences.sCn: 马上，海盗们瞪起眼睛，咬牙切齿，摩拳擦掌，把我们团团围住了。

sentences.sContent: Many things happened, each want to a regret, anxiety, depression, gnash the teeth in anger, if not so good.
sentences.sContent_eng: Many things happened, each want to a regret, anxiety, depression, gnash the teeth in anger, if not so good.
sentences.sCn: 很多事情发生后，每想一次后悔一次，焦虑、压抑、咬牙切齿，如果当时不那样就好了。

trans.tranOther: to be very angry or unhappy about something, or to move your teeth against each other so that they make a noise, especially because you are unhappy or angry
